entry.title: WIND WARNING, Gonzales Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near the water. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
